issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A fix has been committed, and will be part of the next release
status.name: Release Pending

fields.description:
The issue is discovered by [~tsugawa] while verifying EUCA-12861.

There's a requirement that says there must be at least one subnet attached to an ELB. 
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/latest/classic/elb-manage-subnets.html

Currently when there is one subnet for loadbalancer, detach succeeds.

[root@c-36 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --show-long
LOAD_BALANCER	euca-12861	euca-12861-000122946064.lb.c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=30,target=TCP:8080,timeout=5,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=3}	one	subnet-3eea1719	vpc-20cef502		{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=8080}					{owner-alias=000122946064,group-name=default}	{sg-b9637e1c}	2017-01-27T17:45:51.778Z	internet-facing
fields.summary: Detaching subnet from loadbalancer succeed when there is only one subnet

comments.body: In multi-AZ cloud, disabling AZ or detaching subnets from ELB should fail with warning when there's only one AZ (or subnet) remaining to LB.
[~hspencer] Thanks for the catch! New fix is pushed.

[~spark], nice work.  

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.1-0.25880.37.20170421git9c99cb3.el7}}

*Steps*

# Deploy Eucalyptus 4.4.1 VPC Cloud with multiple AZs - [hspencer-703-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/703/]
{code}
[root@c-36 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-dollar	available
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-market	available
{code}
# Create non-eucalyptus account:
{code}
[root@c-36 ~]# euare-accountcreate -a development-operations -w > .euca/devops-admin.ini
{code}
# Using linked {{cfn-elb-resource-vpc-template.json}} template, create stack:
{code}
[root@c-36 ~]# euform-create-stack ELBTest --template-file cfn-elb-resource-vpc-template.json --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000840802122:stack/ELBTest/a541a9f6-b05d-43f1-afb5-f4b88372d9e2

[root@c-36 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
STACK	ELBTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to create an ELB access logging in Eucalyptus VPC	2017-04-25T03:30:22.273Z
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	elbtest-s3loggingbucket-inb0suqv91l06
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://ELBTest-ELB-4X6HV4VVS4WUI-000840802122.lb.g-08-11.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Try to detach the only subnet linked to the ELB:
{code}
[root@c-36 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --show-long --region devops-admin@
LOAD_BALANCER	ELBTest-ELB-4X6HV4VVS4WUI	ELBTest-ELB-4X6HV4VVS4WUI-000840802122.lb.g-08-11.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=90,target=HTTP:80/,timeout=60,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=5}	black-dollar	subnet-0c111793	vpc-7dc2b132		{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-port=80}				{owner-alias=000840802122,group-name=ELBTest-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-JFPAYCFK6HEA3}	{sg-91924bd8}	2017-04-25T03:31:22.433Z	internet-facing

[root@c-36 ~]# eulb-detach-lb-from-subnets -s subnet-0c111793 ELBTest-ELB-4X6HV4VVS4WUI --region devops-admin@
eulb-detach-lb-from-subnets: error (InvalidConfigurationRequest): Requested configuration change is invalid: Loadbalancer must be attached to at least one subnet
{code}
# Using linked {{cfn-elb-twoaz-resource-vpc-template.json}} template, deploy second stack:
{code}
[root@c-36 ~]# euform-create-stack ELBMultiSubnetTest --template-file cfn-elb-twoaz-resource-vpc-template.json --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000840802122:stack/ELBMultiSubnetTest/8327055c-53d1-4121-8533-dbb646452f7c
[root@c-36 ~]# euform-describe-stacks ELBMultiSubnetTest --region devops-admin@
STACK	ELBMultiSubnetTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to create an multiple availability zone ELB with access logging in Eucalyptus VPC	2017-04-25T03:34:19.115Z
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	elbmultisubnettest-s3loggingbucket-uayjxamzsmh0u
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://ELBMultiSubnet-ELB-PLPP8ZZ56WBBZ-000840802122.lb.g-08-11.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Simultaneously, try to remove both subnets associated with ELB:
{code}
[root@c-36 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --show-long ELBMultiSubnet-ELB-PLPP8ZZ56WBBZ --region devops-admin@
LOAD_BALANCER	ELBMultiSubnet-ELB-PLPP8ZZ56WBBZ	ELBMultiSubnet-ELB-PLPP8ZZ56WBBZ-000840802122.lb.g-08-11.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=90,target=HTTP:80/,timeout=60,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=5}	black-market,black-dollar	subnet-26b0d5af,subnet-85b53034	vpc-88026462		{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-port=80}					{owner-alias=000840802122,group-name=ELBMultiSubnetTest-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-JF8UKSBIRRLO2}	{sg-78c5bf7e}	2017-04-25T03:35:24.691Z	internet-facing
[root@c-36 ~]# eulb-detach-lb-from-subnets -s subnet-26b0d5af,subnet-85b53034 ELBMultiSubnet-ELB-PLPP8ZZ56WBBZ --region devops-admin@
eulb-detach-lb-from-subnets: error (InvalidConfigurationRequest): Requested configuration change is invalid: Loadbalancer must be attached to at least one subnet
{code}
# Try to detach one of the subnets from the ELB:
{code}
[root@c-36 ~]# eulb-detach-lb-from-subnets -s subnet-26b0d5af ELBMultiSubnet-ELB-PLPP8ZZ56WBBZ --region devops-admin@
SUBNETS	subnet-85b53034

[root@c-36 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --show-long ELBMultiSubnet-ELB-PLPP8ZZ56WBBZ --region devops-admin@
LOAD_BALANCER	ELBMultiSubnet-ELB-PLPP8ZZ56WBBZ	ELBMultiSubnet-ELB-PLPP8ZZ56WBBZ-000840802122.lb.g-08-11.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=90,target=HTTP:80/,timeout=60,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=5}	black-dollar	subnet-85b53034	vpc-88026462		{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-port=80}		{owner-alias=000840802122,group-name=ELBMultiSubnetTest-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-JF8UKSBIRRLO2}	{sg-78c5bf7e}	2017-04-25T03:35:24.691Z	internet-facing
{code}
# Try to detach the only subnet attached to the ELB:
{code}
[root@c-36 ~]# eulb-detach-lb-from-subnets -s subnet-85b53034 ELBMultiSubnet-ELB-PLPP8ZZ56WBBZ --region devops-admin@
eulb-detach-lb-from-subnets: error (InvalidConfigurationRequest): Requested configuration change is invalid: Loadbalancer must be attached to at least one subnet
{code}
